About

I'm a Software Engineer coming from a background in casino management, I am comfortable working in a fast-paced agile environment, with multiple projects, and can switch contexts quickly. I have strong problem-solving skills and can quickly absorb complicated frameworks and business rules.

I spent 15 years in the casino industry, 10 years in management, where I managed up to 75 employees and was responsible for millions of dollars. I'm now looking to take that business experience and apply it in a career in software development.
